featureStats.title: Over a Decade of Excellence
featureStats.subTitle: We have been serving our clients with dedication and passion.

testimonials.content: KapsTec's commitment to quality and innovation has made them an invaluable partner. Their components have significantly improved our product performance and reliability.
testimonials.author: Michael Johnson
testimonials.role: Supply Chain Director, Global Manufacturing Inc.

testimonials.content: The team at KapsTec is professional, knowledgeable, and always responsive. They consistently deliver high-quality products on time, every time.
testimonials.author: Sarah Williams

testimonials.content: We chose KapsTec for their expertise in custom solutions. They worked closely with us to develop a product that perfectly met our unique specifications.
testimonials.author: David Brown

faqs.subTitle: Find answers to common questions about our products and services.

faqs.question: What industries do you serve?
faqs.answer: We serve a wide range of industries including automotive, aerospace, pharmaceutical, food and beverage, and industrial manufacturing.

faqs.question: Can you provide custom solutions?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in developing custom-engineered solutions to meet the unique needs of our clients. Contact us to discuss your specific requirements.

faqs.question: What is your quality assurance process?
faqs.answer: We are an ISO 9001 certified company and follow stringent quality control measures at every stage of our manufacturing process to ensure the highest quality standards.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship our products to over 50 countries worldwide. We have a dedicated logistics team to ensure timely and secure delivery.
